name: Accredited ITIL Intermediate - SOA
subtitle: Service Offerings and Agreements
description:
The Service Offerings and Agreement series will focus on processes in the Service Strategy and Service Design stages of the ITIL Service Lifecycle.
 
It is a Capability Module that prepares for you an examination that earns you 4 credits toward your ITIL Expert credential. Tune in now as Cherokee and Terry Decker you learn ITIL SOA.
descriptionMD:
The Service Offerings and Agreement series will focus on processes in the Service Strategy and Service Design stages of the ITIL Service Lifecycle.
 
It is a Capability Module that prepares for you an examination that earns you 4 credits toward your ITIL Expert credential. Tune in now as Cherokee and Terry Decker you learn ITIL SOA. For course completion certificates to be submitted for exams, please [contact PassionIT Group](mailto:info@passionitgroup.com).

episodes.title: Overview
episodes.description: The Service Offerings and Agreement series will focus on processes in the Service Strategy and Service Design stages of the ITIL Service Lifecycle. It is a Capability Module that prepares for you an examination that earns you 4 credits toward your ITIL Expert credential. Tune in now as Cherokee and Terry Decker you learn ITIL SOA.

episodes.title: Setting the Stage: Logistics and Expectations
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee introduces ITIL Expert Terry Decker and they set the stage to prepare for the upcoming episode topics.

episodes.title: ITIL Foundation Refresher
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Terry review concepts covered in the required prerequisite training  ITIL foundations) to help refresh basic concepts and terminology before diving into ITIL SOA.

episodes.title: ITIL Foundation Refresher Part 2
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Terry continue to cover basic ITIL concepts needed to understand SOA. Some concepts reiterated would be knowing the difference between a solution and a service, identifying two classes of assets customer versus service and more!

episodes.title: The Big Picture of Strategy and Design
episodes.description: In this episode, Cherokee and Terry set the context for strategic and design elements. They examine the "big picture" by explaining a high level overview of relationships between the various services you will learn of in the following shows.

episodes.title: The Big Picture of Strategy and Design Part 2
episodes.description: In this episode, Cherokee and Terry continue to set the context for strategic and design elements. They examine the "big picture" by explaining a high level overview of relationships between the various services you will learn of in the following shows.

episodes.title: The Service Portfolio Management
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Terry addresses how the process of Service Portfolio Management contributes to SOA practices. The lifecycle stage emphasized in this show is service strategy. A complete overview of the purpose, objectives, scope and importance of SPM as a process to generate business value is explored and demonstrated using examples. SPM policies, principles, concepts, activities, methods and techniques are explained in relation to SOA practices.

episodes.title: The Service Portfolio Management Part 2
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Terry continue to address how the process of Service Portfolio Management contributes to SOA practices. The lifecycle stage emphasized in this show is service strategy. A complete overview of the purpose, objectives, scope and importance of SPM as a process to generate business value is explored and demonstrated using examples. SPM policies, principles, concepts, activities, methods and techniques are explained in relation to SOA practices.

episodes.title: The Service Portfolio Management Part 3
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Terry continue to address how the process of Service Portfolio Management contributes to SOA practices. The lifecycle stage emphasized in this show is service strategy. A complete overview of the purpose, objectives, scope and importance of SPM as a process to generate business value is explored and demonstrated using examples. SPM policies, principles, concepts, activities, methods and techniques are explained in relation to SOA practices.

episodes.title: Service Catalog Management
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Terry address how the process of Service Catalog Management contributes to SOA practices. The lifecycle stage emphasized in this show is service strategy. A complete overview of the purpose, objectives, scope and importance of SCM as a process to generate business value is explored and demonstrated using examples. SCM policies, principles, concepts, activities, methods and techniques are explained in relation to SOA practices.

episodes.title: Service Level Management
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Terry address how the process of Service Level Management contributes to SOA practices. The lifecycle stage emphasized in this show is service design. A complete overview of the purpose, objectives, scope and importance of SLM as a process to generate business value is explored and demonstrated using examples. SLM policies, principles, concepts, activities, methods and techniques are explained in relation to SOA practices.

episodes.title: Demand Management
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Terry discuss Demand Management and explain how it should be conducted to contribute to quality assurance for introducing services that are fit-for-purpose and fit-for-use.

episodes.title: Supplier Management
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Terry address how the process of Supplier Management contributes to SOA practices. The lifecycle stage emphasized in this show is service design. A complete overview of the purpose, objectives, scope and importance of Supplier Management as a process to generate business value is explored and demonstrated using examples. Supplier management policies, principles, concepts, activities, methods and techniques are explained in relation to SOA practices.

episodes.title: Supplier Management Part 2
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Terry continue to address how the process of Supplier Management contributes to SOA practices. The lifecycle stage emphasized in this show is service design. A complete overview of the purpose, objectives, scope and importance of Supplier Management as a process to generate business value is explored and demonstrated using examples. Supplier management policies, principles, concepts, activities, methods and techniques are explained in relation to SOA practices.

episodes.title: Financial Management for IT Services
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Terry discuss how Financial Management for IT services for provides the business and IT with the quantification, in financial terms, of the value of IT Services, the value of the assets underlying the provisioning of those services, and the qualification of operational forecasting.

episodes.title: Business Relationship Management
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Terry address how the process of Business Relationship Management contributes to SOA practices. The lifecycle stage emphasized in this show is service strategy. A complete overview of the purpose, objectives, scope and importance of BRM as a process to generate business value is explored and demonstrated using examples. BRM policies, principles, concepts, activities, methods and techniques are explained in relation to SOA practices.

episodes.title: Technology and Implementation
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Terry discuss technology and implementation considerations and how they contribute to SOA practices. Service design is specifically used to identify good practices and evaluation criteria for technology and tools. Service operation provides the specifics on managing changes in operations, service operation and project management, assessing and managing risk in service operation, operational staff in service design and transition and planning and implementing service management technology. Service transition provides the specifics on the technology considerations for implementing and collaboration for service asset and configuration management and knowledge management.

episodes.title: Sample Paper Review
episodes.description: Terry and Zach go over the first three sample questions from the 'ITIL Intermediate Exams-ITIL Service Offerings & Agreements' section, with the end goal being how to determine your best answer for each.

episodes.title: Sample Paper Review Part 2
episodes.description: "Terry and Zach go over 5 sample questions from the 'ITIL Intermediate Exams' ITIL Service Offerings & Agreements section, with the end goal being how to determine your best answer for each. In this episode, Terry & Zach cover questions 4 through 8, and offer a direction to PassionITGroup.Com & Deckerheads@yahoo.com."
